      • createHashedPassword

        public static String createHashedPassword(String password)
        This method will create a hashed password and return it, with help of userns password. The MD5 Message-Digest Algorithm is a cryptographic hash function that produces a 128-bit (16-byte) hash value. The basic idea is to map data sets of variable length to data sets of a fixed length. In order to do this, the input message is split into chunks of 512-bit blocks. A padding is added to the end so that itâ€™s length can be divided by 512. Now, these blocks are processed by the MD5 algorithm, which operates in a 128-bit state, and the result will be a 128-bit hash value. After applying MD5, generated hash is typically a 32-digit hexadecimal number.
        Parameters:
        password - Userns password.
        Returns:
        Returns a new hashed password String

      • carportCalculaterFlatRoof

        public static List<Product> carportCalculaterFlatRoof(double length,
                                                      double width,
                                                      String roofMaterial)
        This methode is called in, CreateOrderFlatRoof.java in presentationLayer, to get the total price of the carport, what is then used to create a carport in the Database, OrderRequestFlatRoof.java in presentationLayer, to get the total price of the carport, what is used to show the price at orderRequestFlatRoof.jsp, SeeOrderProductList.java in presentationLayer, to show a List of parts for an specifik customer by Id.
        Parameters:
        length - Length of the carport from carportFlatRood.jsp
        width - Width of the carport from carportFlatRood.jsp
        roofMaterial - Roof material is choosen from the client through carportFlarRoof.jsp or carportPointedRoof.jsp.
        Returns:
        Returns a list of all products, that is needed to build a carport with a flat roof.

      • carportCalculaterFlatRoofIncludingShed

        public static List<Product> carportCalculaterFlatRoofIncludingShed(double length,
                                                                   double width,
                                                                   double shedLength,
                                                                   double shedWidth,
                                                                   String roofMaterial)
        This methode is called in, CreateOrderFlatRoof.java in presentationLayer, to get the total price of the carport, what is then used to create a carport in the Database, OrderRequestFlatRoof.java in presentationLayer, to get the total price of the carport, what is used to show the price at orderRequestFlatRoof.jsp, SeeOrderProductList.java in presentationLayer, to show a List of parts for an specifik customer by Id.
        Parameters:
        length - Length of the carport from carportFlatRoof.jsp.
        width - Width of the carport from carportFlatRoof.jsp.
        shedLength - Length of shed from carportFlatRoof.jsp.
        shedWidth - Width of shed from carportFlatRoof.jsp.
        roofMaterial - Roof material is choosen from the client through carportFlarRoof.jsp or carportPointedRoof.jsp.
        Returns:
        Returns a list of all products, that is needed to build a carport with a flat roof and shed.

      • roundDoubleToTwoDecimalPoints

        public static double roundDoubleToTwoDecimalPoints(double value)
        This method with help of javas DecimalFormater, rounds a double to two decimal after the comma, This methode is called in, LogicFacade.java in functionLayer, in method totalPriceOfCarport, Product.java in functionLayer, in method getPriceLine.
        Parameters:
        value - is a price value
        Returns:
        Returns a double with two decimals after the comma.

      • totalPriceOfCarport

        public static double totalPriceOfCarport(List<Product> stykliste)
        This method takes a list of parts, loop through the list and add each priceLine of each product with eachother.
        Parameters:
        stykliste - Is a specific list of an Carport with all products needed to build it.
        Returns:
        Returns the total price of an Carport.
